Pat Quinn’s remarkable career deserving of Hockey Hall of Fame</title><description>It was almost six years ago when Pat Quinn sat in the press box at Rogers Arena, ruminating on the events that had brought him to this place, wondering why the game he loved so dearly had turned its back on him. The Vancouver Canucks didn&#8217;t tender the restricted free agent a qualifying offer by the Monday deadline and in a hockey sense, that&#8217;s not great news for any player.
